scenario_text.value:
Hey Takuma, which way’s the amusement park
from here?
Uh...over that way.
Great! Thanks, Takuma!

(Hm? It looks like she’s praying in the
direction of the amusement park...)
Please, let everyone be okay.

Oh, were you praying for the safety of the
little ones in the amusement park?

Yeah. I know we can’t go see them again until
we beat the Master, but I’m still worried.
That’s real nice of you, Miu!

Well, of course she’d be worried about them!
She was their queen!

Eheheh... But now all I can do is pray that
they’re safe.

What do you think, Takuma? Are Jijimon and
the little ones all okay?

(I’m not sure how to answer that. I want to
cheer her up, but I don’t want to lie.)
(What should I tell Miu?)
I don’t know.
Let’s trust in them.
I’m sure they’re fine.
I don’t know.

I don’t know. It’s just Jijimon and the
little ones, and that park is in bad shape.
Yeah... That’s true.

So what we need to do is beat the Master real
quick, then go check in on them.
Yeah... Yeah, you’re right.
Let’s trust in them.

Let’s trust in them, and have faith that
they’re all okay.
Have faith?

That’s right. We can’t know how they’re doing
for sure, but we did all we could for them.

Now we just have to trust that they’ll make
it on their own.

Oh, I get it. Well, I’m sure they can make it
if they try!
I’m going to have faith in them!
I’m sure they’re fine.

I’m sure they’re fine. The fog cleared up in
the area, so there’s nothing to worry about.
Yeah, you’re right! Eheheh.
Hey...thanks, Takuma.
Huh? What for?

Well, you can’t actually know how the little
ones are doing,
but you wanted to cheer me up, right?

Oh, you figured it out, huh? Well, now I feel
stupid.

No, it’s okay! I’m happy you wanted to be
nice to me!

You know, while we’re still in this world, we
can go back to the park and see everyone.

But after we go back home...we’ll never be
able to see them again.
Maybe not, but I wouldn’t give up hope.

The professor was able to come back as an
adult, so it’s not like we can never return.

Oh yeah... You’re right! We might be able to
come back!

Thanks, Takuma! Now I’m not worried about
anything anymore!

(I may have said that to encourage Miu, but
I realized I’ve had the same odd certainty.)

(This feeling that if we ever go back to our
world, we’ll never come here again.)
Let’s all work hard to beat the Master!
